No email app installed No phone app installed Support Request Opening tutorial: %1$s Getting Started Learn the basics of the app Finding Properties Search and filter properties Managing Documents Upload and manage property documents
How do I search for properties? You can search for properties by using the search bar on the dashboard or by going to the Search tab. You can filter your search by location, price, property type, and more. How do I save a property? To save a property, open the property details and tap the heart icon in the top right corner. You can view all your saved properties in the Saved tab. Can I contact property owners directly? Yes, you can contact property owners or agents directly from the property details page by tapping the Contact button or using the provided contact information. How do I list my property for sale or rent? To list your property, go to your Profile tab, tap on List a Property and follow the instructions to add details, photos, and pricing information. How secure are payments through the app? All payments made through our app are secured with industry-standard encryption. We support multiple payment methods and do not store your sensitive payment information.

Hello! Welcome to RealEstateApp. I’m here to help you find the perfect property. Are you looking to buy or rent? Buy Rent Great! What’s your budget range? AED 0 - 500,000 AED 500,000+ Got it! Which city are you interested in? Islamabad Lahore Thanks for your input! I’ll find properties matching your requirements Congratulations! Jo ghar aap dhoondna chahte the, aapko woh mil jayega.
